Meta.title: Better Gene Modification
Meta.author: zwa73
Meta.description:
这个mod提供了一个BepInEX配置文件 sosarciel.bettergenemodification.cfg 允许你设置: 基因容量上限 基因容量上限乘数 基因的专长点数乘数 基因合成时间乘数 在移除基因时返还基因物品 允许移除任何基因 基因槽位乘数 修改金属伤害计算(无论特性等级固定为1/10的伤害减免, 原版在为999级时能获得高达1/1000的不合理减免, 在1级时却又几乎不提供任何减免) 修改硬件升级(玛尼的神器效果)为拥有魔导生命体专长(魔像种族专长)的单位提供增幅(原版仅有机械种族与玛尼使徒能获得增幅) 移除防卫本能专长(圣骑士职业专长)的信仰限制
注意, 所有选项默认都不启用 你需要手动在游戏安装目录的BepInEX配置(如"SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.bettergenemodification.cfg") 内更改配置使其生效
This mod provides a BepInEX configuration file sosarciel.bettergenemodification.cfg that allows you to: Change the maximum gene capacity Gene count upper limit multiplier Multiplier for gene feat points Multiplier for gene synthesis time Return the gene item when a gene is removed Allows all genes to be removed Multiplier for gene slot consumption Modify metal damage calculation (fixed 1/10 damage reduction regardless of trait level; original version provided unreasonable 1/1000 reduction at level 999, and almost no reduction at level 1) Modify Hardware Upgrade (Mani artifact effect) to provide boost to units with the Arcane Core feat (Golem race feat); original version only provided boost to mechanical race and Mani apostles Remove the faith restriction for the Defensive Instinct feat (Paladin class feat)
Note: All options are disabled by default. You need to manually change the configuration in the BepInEX config directory within your game installation folder (e.g., "SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.bettergenemodification.cfg") for them to take effect.
